blogs.heading: Knowledge Base
blogs.subheading: Writing an article is not as easy as I thought, but I was able to write articles based on challenges and problems encountered with the solution provided based on my knowledge during coding. Although, I am improving on writing more articles and getting better.

blogSlides.categories: 11 Mar 2021 ・Updated on 22 Mar ・3 min read
blogSlides.title: Font Awesome and React-Icons in React
blogSlides.content: Icons are visual cues that help communicate concepts on web pages and every other application. Icons also stand as a visual language for effective communication and help users interpret a concept correctly.
blogSlides.alt: Font Awesome and React-Icons in React

blogSlides.categories: 12 Jan 2021 ・Updated on 11 Mar ・5 min read
blogSlides.title: CREATE, UPDATE, ADD and DELETE SEQUELIZE MIGRATION
blogSlides.content: Did you have an existing sequelize that you wish to make changes like adding more columns, deleting, or modifying a particular column? Have you been deleting/dropping all the migrations completely and re-running migrations all over again for changes to reflect? If yes this article is for you.
blogSlides.alt: CREATE, UPDATE, ADD and DELETE SEQUELIZE MIGRATION

blogSlides.title: PWA in VUE VITE
blogSlides.content: PWA is a Progressive Web App that makes a website look and behaves like a mobile app. PWAs are built to take advantage of native mobile device features without downloading or purchasing on Play Store.....
